title: Can supports have an extra slot for control ward
body:
I really want to keep buying control wards after I'm full build, not that games last that long anymore. 
Not sure why, but I just really like buying them. 
Would be nice to have an extra slot for all the roles, actually, but if it's too much to ask for, just give it to supports and junglers.
If that's too much as well, give it to the support.

replies.body:
It would be nice to have a slot for control wards or wards in general because as a support i wouldn't need to waste 1 slot for warding item and i could instead buy another supp item.

But there would be the problem that how do you make it support exclusive and stuff, because people will probably find a way to abuse it and then riot would probably just remove it because everyone has to ruin supports' lifes
And they still wonder why no one plays support

I feel like they could make the control ward to replace your regular ward. So you still buy a control ward, it replaces your current selection of the ward, and the amount of control wards stack. So when you use up all of the control wards that you bought, then you get the ward that you had before you bought the control.

If riot put this in then they would have to make it so that your current ward is still under cd while you hold the control ward, otherwise you can use up all of your regular wards, go to base and buy control ward, come back to lane plop down the control ward and then you instantly have a ward.
This has been asked for since forever. A slot specifically for wards, which totally makes sense to have yet still never to happen.
I get it might be strong for champs like Lee and Jax, but I still want it because it feels like the amount of vision I'm putting down is reduced late game.
